summary: A pre‑trained model wrapper for the DINO v2 vision transformer that handles configuration, weight loading and prepares the network for downstream computer‑vision tasks such as feature extraction or fine‑tuning.
business_intent: Provide developers with an easy‑to‑use, ready‑made DINO v2 model so they can quickly integrate state‑of‑the‑art self‑supervised visual representations into their applications without training from scratch.
